column4: Hi, In gtkpod I renamed the ipod mount name, and now when I plug in the ipod a get an error and it doesn't mount. I'm a bit lost, any one know how to fix this?
check in gconf-editor under storage , toward the bottom delete the mountpoint of your ipod if you see it in there
It still wont mount, I get the error, "Unable to mount media, There is probably no media in the drive" When I click on the Apple iPod Music Player nameon the filesystem
that's the best I can do for you , you need an ipod user to help you out , I'M not that wealthy
